name: Abandoned (itch) (LAT46)
description:
This game was made for the I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story game jam, but I ended up missing the due date, so here it is.

Abandoned (working title) is a top-down 2D story game about waking up without a clue as to where, or who you are. In this current build, there's only one route to take in the beginning, which takes about a minute to complete (There's really not much at all in this game, I spent all my time scripting and drawing lol). 

I might turn this into a full game at some point, which multiple routes and character relationships and such, but at the moment this is all I got done. You can quit the application at anytime by pressing "Esc".

This is the most work I've put into a 2D game, both scripting and graphics, so feedback is greatly appreciated.
